page.title: 11 BED AND BREAKFAST
page.content: RIVENDELL IS THE NAME OF MY HOUSE.WE HAVE FIVE BEDROOMS , A DINING ROOM, A KITCHEN AND A LIVINGROOM. WE ARE OPEN ALL THE TIME EXCEPT WHEN WE ARE ON HOLIDAY. MY DAD CATCHES MACKEREL,LOBSTER AND CRABS IN HIS CREELS AND HAND-LINE. WE USE THESE FOR OUR BED AND BREAKFAST. MY DAD IS AN ELECTRICIAN AND PAINTER. HE FISHES AND BUILDS. OUR HOUSE WAS AN OLD TEMPERANCE HOTEL BUT WE RE-NAMED IT. THE OLD KITCHEN IS NOW THE VILLAGE POST-OFFICE. WE DO PRAWNS,SALADS,STEAKS AND LAMBCHOPS SERVERED WITH ROAST POTATOES AND PEAS. FOR BREAKFAST WE DO CORNFLAKES,PORRIDGE,TOAST,BACON AND EGGS AND SCRAMBLED EGGS AND SAUSAGE. FROM THE GUESTS ROOM THERE IS A GOOD VIEW OF THE SEA AND HILLS.
